values: 不良鲜师3(台) / 要命教书匠3
para: 《该死的歌德3》是博拉·达格特肯执导，埃利亚斯·穆巴里克、卡蒂娅·里曼、杰拉·哈斯、桑德拉·惠勒主演的喜剧片。讲述痞子泽基出狱后混入学校伪装成代课老师的故事。桑德拉·惠勒([托尼·厄德曼])将加盟新片[该死的歌德3]。该系列讲述了痞子泽基(埃利亚斯·穆巴里克饰)出狱后混入学校伪装成代课老师的故事。据悉，桑德拉将扮演一个机智的新教练，她将与埃利亚斯·穆巴里克扮演的伪代课老师和问题学生们斗智斗勇。 导演 Director宝拉·达格特金Bora Dagtekin编剧 Writer宝拉·达格特金 Bora Dagtekin制作人 Produced byPatty Saffeels- line producer马丁·莫兹科维茨 Martin Moszkowicz- executive producerLena Olbrich- associate producerNicole Springstubbe- producerTheresa Waldmann- assistant producer摄影 CinematographyMarkus Nestroy剪辑 Film EditingCharles LadmiralConstantin von Seld原创音乐 Original MusicKonstantin Djorkaeff SchererVincent Stein艺术指导 Production DesignerEva Stiebler美术设计 Art Direction byBettina Morell服装设计 Costume Design byRegina Tiedeken副导演/助理导演 Assistant DirectorKim Doyen- second assistant directorLaurentius Emmelmann- second unit directorManuel Kreuzpaintner- first assistant directorMaximiliane Prokop- assistant directorChristiane Weigand- third assistant director声音部门 Sound DepartmentHubert Bartholomae- sound designerPit Kuhlmann- dialogue editorAttila Makai- boom operatorRainer Petershagen- sound mixerPhilipp Sellier- sound designerChristoph von Schönburg- sound effects editor布景师 Set Decoration byCara Hünnekes选角导演 CastingFranziska SchlattnerDaniela Tolkien化妆造型 Makeup DepartmentChristina Baier- makeup artistBarbara Deuble- additional makeup artistAgnes Ellert- makeup artistAnna-Laura Peters- assistant makeup artistAlisza Pfeifer- hair stylist: additionalNadine Scherer- makeup artist
